abstract: European Commission says it is concerned about how General Electric's $13.5 billion acquisition of Alstom would affect competition in heavy-duty gas turbines market.
lead_paragraph: The European Commission said it was worried that G.E., as the world’s top maker of heavy-duty gas turbines, would be eliminating a major competitor.

headline.main: General Electric Deal for Alstom Raises Concerns Among European Authorities
headline.print_headline: General Electric Deal for Alstom Raises Concerns Among European Authorities

snippet: The European Commission said it was worried that G.E., as the world’s top maker of heavy-duty gas turbines, would be eliminating a major competitor.
